name: Epic Game Maker - Sandbox Platformer
description:
Epic Game Maker is a sandbox 2D platformer with a level editor. Create levels of your dreams and share your creations with other players!
Also you can play online levels created by other players and rate them. The best levels will appear at the top of the list, which will give an opportunity their authors to become famous!Features
  • Built-in level editor
  • Upload levels to the game server
  • Ability to play any levels online
  • Nice interface and fantasy 2D graphics
  • Different characters like knight, goblin, demon, orc etc.

Creating levels in this game is a very fun and easy process. You simply draw objects in cells, arrange blocks, objects and characters.
The mission at the level will depend on what objects you used when creating. For example, if you add at least one key and doors, the mission will be to
find all the keys and then open the door.

Each character in the game has a unique weapon and characteristics. All characters can be divided into 3 types - warriors, archers and mages.

In game updates, we plan to add more characters and objects so you can create a variety of levels and make other players happy!
